name: Zombies Escape
description:
You are the last two human beings, but you too will soon become zombies.

Collect pills to delay your transformation, and be the last to survive. But if you become a Zombie, switch sides and attack your old friend!

This game is a participation in the Ludum Dare 50, with the theme: Delay the inevitable

Controls First Player:

  • Movements : ZQSD
  • Jump : Space Bar

Controls Second Player:

  • Movements : Arrows
  • Jump : Left CTRL

Technologies Used :

  • Game Engine : Unity
  • Musics and Sound effects : GarageBand
  • Graphic Assets : Piskel
